00023 #include "dfsch.h"
00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 #include <stdlib.h>
00026 #include <readline/readline.h>
00027 #include <readline/history.h>
00028 
00035 int main(int argc, char**argv){
00036   
00037   dfsch_ctx_t* ctx = dfsch_make_context();
00038 
00039   dfsch_ctx_define(ctx,"version",dfsch_make_string("0.1"));
00040   dfsch_ctx_define(ctx,"argv0",dfsch_make_string(argv[0]));
00041   dfsch_ctx_define(ctx,"arg-count",dfsch_make_number(argc));
00042 
00043   dfsch_ctx_define(ctx,"abort!",dfsch_make_primitive(&abort));
00044 
00045   rl_bind_key ('\t', rl_insert);
00046 
00047   while (1){
00048     char *str;
00049     char *out;
00050     dfsch_object_t *exp, *res;
00051 
00052     str = readline("]=> ");
00053     if (!str)
00054       break;
00055     add_history(str);
00056 
00057 
00058     exp = dfsch_obj_read(str);
00059     free(str);
00060     res = dfsch_ctx_eval(ctx, exp);
00061     out = dfsch_obj_write(res,100);
00062 
00063     puts(out);
00064     free(out);
00065     
00066     dfsch_gc();
00067   }
00068 
00069   dfsch_destroy_context(ctx);
00070 
00071   return 0;
00072 }
